org.openimaj.ml.clustering.spectral

Class SpectralIndexedClusters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.ml.clustering.IndexClusters
      • org.openimaj.ml.clustering.spectral.SpectralIndexedClusters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Readable, ReadableASCII, ReadableBinary, ReadWriteable, Writeable, WriteableASCII, WriteableBinary, Clusters

    public class SpectralIndexedClusters
extends IndexClusters
    IndexClusters which also hold the eigenvector/value pairs which created them
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
